\hypertarget{independent-contractor-agreement}{%
\section{INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
AGREEMENT}\label{independent-contractor-agreement}}

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

This Independent Contractor Agreement (the ``\textbf{Agreement}'') is
entered into as of \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_, 2025 (the
``\textbf{Effective Date}''), by and between:

\textbf{BLAUWEISS-EDV LLC}, a Texas Limited Liability Company\\
(hereinafter referred to as the ``Company'')

and

\textbf{WOLFRAM LAUBE}\\
Unterer Stadtplatz 18, 4780 Sch√§rding, Austria\\
(hereinafter referred to as the ``Contractor'')

(each a ``Party'' and collectively the ``Parties'')

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{recitals}{%
\subsection{RECITALS}\label{recitals}}

\textbf{WHEREAS}, the Company is engaged in the business of providing
information technology services, including software development, cloud
architecture, DevOps consulting, and artificial intelligence solutions;

\textbf{WHEREAS}, the Contractor possesses specialized skills and
expertise in software architecture, cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and
AI/machine learning, with over 25 years of professional experience in
the IT industry;

\textbf{WHEREAS}, the Contractor is currently subject to insolvency
proceedings (Konkursverfahren GZ 17 S 35/25 s) at the Regional Court
Ried im Innkreis, Austria, and wishes to engage in gainful employment in
a manner consistent with the requirements of such proceedings;

\textbf{NOW, THEREFORE}, in consideration of the mutual covenants and
agreements herein contained, the Parties agree as follows:

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-1-engagement-and-services}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 1 -- ENGAGEMENT AND
SERVICES}\label{article-1-engagement-and-services}}

\hypertarget{engagement}{%
\subsubsection{1.1 Engagement}\label{engagement}}

The Company hereby engages the Contractor, and the Contractor hereby
accepts such engagement, to provide information technology services to
the Company and its clients on the terms and conditions set forth in
this Agreement.

\hypertarget{scope-of-services}{%
\subsubsection{1.2 Scope of Services}\label{scope-of-services}}

The Contractor shall provide the following services (the ``Services''):

\begin{enumerate}
\def\labelenumi{(\alph{enumi})}
\tightlist
\item
  Software architecture design and implementation\\
\item
  Cloud infrastructure planning and deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP)\\
\item
  DevOps and CI/CD pipeline development\\
\item
  Kubernetes administration and container orchestration\\
\item
  AI/Machine Learning solution development\\
\item
  Technical documentation and consulting\\
\item
  Such other IT services as may be mutually agreed upon
\end{enumerate}

\hypertarget{performance-of-services}{%
\subsubsection{1.3 Performance of
Services}\label{performance-of-services}}

The Contractor shall perform the Services remotely from Austria or such
other location as the Contractor may determine. The Contractor shall
provide Services for specific projects as assigned by the Company, and
shall maintain regular communication with Company personnel regarding
project status and deliverables.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-2-independent-contractor-status}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 2 -- INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
STATUS}\label{article-2-independent-contractor-status}}

\hypertarget{independent-contractor-relationship}{%
\subsubsection{2.1 Independent Contractor
Relationship}\label{independent-contractor-relationship}}

The Contractor is an independent contractor and not an employee,
partner, agent, or joint venturer of the Company. Nothing in this
Agreement shall be construed to create an employment relationship
between the Parties. The Contractor shall not be entitled to any
employee benefits provided by the Company.

\hypertarget{no-authority-to-bind}{%
\subsubsection{2.2 No Authority to Bind}\label{no-authority-to-bind}}

The Contractor shall have no authority to bind the Company or to enter
into any contracts or commitments on behalf of the Company unless
expressly authorized in writing.

\hypertarget{taxes-and-social-contributions}{%
\subsubsection{2.3 Taxes and Social
Contributions}\label{taxes-and-social-contributions}}

The Contractor shall be solely responsible for all taxes, social
security contributions, and other statutory obligations arising from the
compensation received under this Agreement in accordance with the laws
of Austria and any other applicable jurisdiction.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-3-compensation}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 3 -- COMPENSATION}\label{article-3-compensation}}

\hypertarget{modest-living-compensation}{%
\subsubsection{3.1 Modest Living
Compensation}\label{modest-living-compensation}}

In recognition of the Contractor's current circumstances, including the
pending insolvency proceedings, the Parties agree that the Contractor
shall receive a fixed monthly compensation sufficient to maintain a
modest standard of living appropriate for a person subject to insolvency
proceedings under Austrian law. The specific monthly amount shall be
determined in consultation with the insolvency administrator (APOR
Unternehmensverwaltung GmbH) and shall be documented in a written
addendum to this Agreement.

\hypertarget{payment-terms}{%
\subsubsection{3.2 Payment Terms}\label{payment-terms}}

Payment shall be made by bank transfer to an account designated by the
Contractor, payable within fifteen (15) days following the end of each
calendar month in which Services were provided.

\hypertarget{currency}{%
\subsubsection{3.3 Currency}\label{currency}}

All compensation shall be denominated and paid in Euros (EUR).

\hypertarget{expenses}{%
\subsubsection{3.4 Expenses}\label{expenses}}

The Company shall reimburse the Contractor for reasonable and
pre-approved out-of-pocket expenses incurred in connection with the
Services, including travel expenses if travel is required and approved
in advance.

\hypertarget{accounting}{%
\subsubsection{3.5 Accounting}\label{accounting}}

The Company shall provide the Contractor with monthly statements showing
Services rendered and compensation paid. Such statements shall be
available for review by the insolvency administrator upon request.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-4-term-and-termination}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 4 -- TERM AND
TERMINATION}\label{article-4-term-and-termination}}

\hypertarget{term}{%
\subsubsection{4.1 Term}\label{term}}

This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue
until terminated by either Party in accordance with this Article 4.

\hypertarget{termination-for-convenience}{%
\subsubsection{4.2 Termination for
Convenience}\label{termination-for-convenience}}

Either Party may terminate this Agreement at any time upon thirty (30)
days' prior written notice to the other Party.

\hypertarget{termination-for-cause}{%
\subsubsection{4.3 Termination for Cause}\label{termination-for-cause}}

Either Party may terminate this Agreement immediately upon written
notice if the other Party materially breaches any provision of this
Agreement and fails to cure such breach within fifteen (15) days after
receiving written notice thereof.

\hypertarget{effect-of-termination}{%
\subsubsection{4.4 Effect of Termination}\label{effect-of-termination}}

Upon termination of this Agreement: (a) the Company shall pay the
Contractor all compensation earned through the date of termination; (b)
the Contractor shall deliver to the Company all work product, documents,
and materials relating to the Services; and (c) the provisions of
Articles 5, 6, and 7 shall survive termination.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-5-confidentiality}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 5 --
CONFIDENTIALITY}\label{article-5-confidentiality}}

The Contractor agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary
and confidential information of the Company and its clients obtained in
connection with the Services. This obligation shall survive the
termination of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-6-intellectual-property}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 6 -- INTELLECTUAL
PROPERTY}\label{article-6-intellectual-property}}

All work product, inventions, and intellectual property created by the
Contractor in the course of providing Services shall be the sole and
exclusive property of the Company or the Company's client, as
applicable. The Contractor hereby assigns all right, title, and interest
in such work product to the Company.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-7-representations-and-warranties}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 7 -- REPRESENTATIONS AND
WARRANTIES}\label{article-7-representations-and-warranties}}

\hypertarget{contractors-representations}{%
\subsubsection{7.1 Contractor's
Representations}\label{contractors-representations}}

The Contractor represents and warrants that:

\begin{enumerate}
\def\labelenumi{(\alph{enumi})}
\tightlist
\item
  The Contractor has disclosed to the Company the existence of the
  pending insolvency proceedings and any restrictions that may apply to
  the Contractor's engagement;\\
\item
  The Contractor has obtained or will obtain any required approvals from
  the insolvency administrator prior to commencing Services;\\
\item
  The Contractor has the legal capacity to enter into this Agreement and
  perform the Services contemplated herein.
\end{enumerate}

\hypertarget{companys-representations}{%
\subsubsection{7.2 Company's
Representations}\label{companys-representations}}

The Company represents and warrants that it has the authority to enter
into this Agreement and to engage the Contractor on the terms set forth
herein.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{article-8-miscellaneous}{%
\subsection{ARTICLE 8 -- MISCELLANEOUS}\label{article-8-miscellaneous}}

\hypertarget{governing-law}{%
\subsubsection{8.1 Governing Law}\label{governing-law}}

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the
laws of the State of Texas, without regard to its conflict of laws
principles.

\hypertarget{amendments}{%
\subsubsection{8.2 Amendments}\label{amendments}}

This Agreement may be amended only by a written instrument signed by
both Parties.

\hypertarget{entire-agreement}{%
\subsubsection{8.3 Entire Agreement}\label{entire-agreement}}

This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior agreements
and understandings.

\hypertarget{severability}{%
\subsubsection{8.4 Severability}\label{severability}}

If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or
unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and
effect.

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}

\hypertarget{signatures}{%
\subsection{SIGNATURES}\label{signatures}}

\textbf{IN WITNESS WHEREOF}, the Parties have executed this Agreement as
of the Effective Date first written above.

\textbf{BLAUWEISS-EDV LLC}

By:
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\\

\textbf{CONTRACTOR}

\begin{center}\rule{0.5\linewidth}{0.5pt}\end{center}
